name: Bike Management System
description: Created Bike Management System with real-time updates, CRUD, advanced filtering, secure JWT. Used RTK Query, Redux, ensuring responsive UI.
details1: Developed the Bike Management System, an open-source platform for bike inventory, featuring real-time updates, CRUD, and advanced filtering.
details2: Enhanced security with JWT for authentication and role-based access, supporting features for both buyers and sellers.
details3: Utilized RTK Query and Redux for efficient data management and a mobile-responsive UI, ensuring smooth performance on all devices.
technology: React, Redux, TypeScript, Node, Express, Mongoose.

name: Groca-Grocery
description: A smart solution for effortless inventory management, ensuring a smoother and more organized grocery shopping experience.
details1: Developed a project where users can Sign up, Log in, order products, restock products, etc.
details2: Integrated Admin role, An admin can manage products, delete products, add products.
details3: Used firebase and JWT for authentication and hosting, and deploy the server to Heroku.
technology: React, React-bootstrap, Node, Express, MongoDB, Firebase, Vercel.

name: Motor-Parts
description: Developed a project where user can create their profile, and update their profile, make a review & order products.
details1: Developed a project where user can create their profile, and update their profile, make a review & order products.
details2: Integrated Admin role, admin can manage or remove a user, make the user an admin, add a product, or delete products.
technology: React, Tailwind, Daisy UI, JWT, React-router, Node, Express, MongoDB, Firebase, Heroku.

name: Watts Basketball
description: Dive into the basketball world with watts-basketball, a dynamic React JS and Tailwind CSS project offering an immersive experience with its standout design and user-friendly features.
